desc: I need some help with internet marketing. Before moving forward, we first want to see some sample postings for all four platforms (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram) based on what we are sharing with you. We understand that we are coming to you last minute, but we would really appreciate it if you could provide us with samples by this tomorrow-Wednesday so we can come to a decision by the end of the week.Here is a OneDrive folder link with content that you could use for the sample posts: [url removed, login to view]!AhtK81mleqi3lTbDX4Zn9NAn03xYHere are some stats on our 10 practices that you could also incorporate:[url removed, login to view]As for messaging and branding on our social media platforms, the main areas of focus are:1. We primarily want to sell the concept that video calling is a trusted form of booking sessions, though we also offer phone call and in-person bookings.2. Creating trust with the customers- we want to show that we have created a curated and vetted list of the best practitioners from all over the country and overseas as well. We want them to feel that we are a trusted source for holistic healing.3. We want to let the customers know of all of the various services that we are offering (100 online courses for self-study, 150 guided meditations, webinars and workshops/ retreats/ events).4. We also want to demonstrate that we are a one-stop shop for hollisting healing, all the while coming across as experts in the 10 practices that BTH offers (Astrology, Hypnotherapy, Nutrition Coaching, Life Coaching, Reiki, Energy Healing, Personal Training, Acupuncture, Alternative medicine, Ayurveda/Naturotherapy, and Yoga)Here is a document with some in-house ideas for daily themes/hashtags, and day-to-day planning: [url removed, login to view]The main/"tagline" hashtag we want to use for BTH is #IAmWhole, but it would be great if you had any other ideas!Overall, if we do decide to work together: we would love it if you would also provide us with some creative concepts of your own, as well as a (2 week) content calendar that we can review prior to executing.
title: Sales and Marketing
